Fast Fourier Transform (FFT)

Functions for Fast Fourier Transform (FFT) of a series of temperatures

fft_rfft()
Fourier coefficients
fft_freq()
FFT frequencies
fft_period()
FFT periods
fft_mean()
FFT mean
fft_powers()
FFT powers
fft_energy()
FFT energy
fft_variance()
FFT variance
fft_delay()
FFT delay
fft_reconstruct()
FFT reconstruct
